greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = number of positive integers k < n such that n XOR k = (n+k).
comment: The number of positive integers k < n such that n XOR k = (n-k) is A038573(n).
formula: a(n) = -1 + 2^(number of 0's in binary expansion of n). a(n) = 2^A080791(n) - 1 = A080100(n) - 1.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 21 2006
